m_szDocTitle: What to Expect When Tesla (TSLA) Reports Earnings Tomorrow - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet What to Expect When Tesla (TSLA) Reports Earnings Tomorrow By Amanda Gomez | 08/04/15 - 04:54 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla ( TSLA - Get Report ) is scheduled to announce its earnings results for the 2015 second quarter after the market close on Wednesday afternoon. Analysts are anticipating a year-over-year decrease in earnings, but a year-over-year increase in revenue for the quarter ended June 30. The company is expected to post a loss of 60 cents per share on revenue of $1.17 billion, according to analysts surveyed by Thomson Reuters. Tesla reported earnings of 1
